car.name: Ford Mustang
car.des: Hear the roar of a Mustang as the ground starts to tremble and your legs start to shake. As always, Mustang draws upon its performance roots with features for enhanced handling, high-powered engine options and a classic Mustang design.

car.name: Mercedes Class-A
car.des: Become a part of the Star legacy with the bold and stylish all-new A-Class Limousine. Be it formal events or weekend getaways, fit in everywhere in a Star just like you. Blue & Beige interiors. Expression Interior. Fit & healthy features. Intelligent light system.

car.name: Hyundai Creata
car.des: Hyundai Creta is a 5 seater SUV with a mileage of 16.8 KMPL depending upon its transmission and fuel type. Its 4 cylinder, 1497 cc, 1.5 MPi can generate 115 PS @ 6300rpm power and 144 Nm @ 4500 rpm torque. It has a fuel tank capacity of 50 Litres L.

car.name: MG Hector
car.des: The MG Hector has 1 Diesel Engine and 1 Petrol Engine on offer. The Diesel engine is 1956 cc while the Petrol engine is 1451 cc . It is available with Automatic & Manual transmission.Depending upon the variant and fuel type the Hector has a mileage of & Ground clearance of Hector is 192.

car.name: Mercedes Class-C
car.des: Mercedes-Benz C-Class is a 5 seater Luxury available in a price range of Rs. 50.01 - 70.66 Lakh*. It is available in 3 variants, 2 engine options that are BS6 compliant and a single Automatic transmission.
